name: Electrical Engineering
tagline: Powering innovation through electrical engineering excellence

overview.introduction: The Department of Electrical Engineering focuses on developing expertise in power systems, control systems, and electrical machines while emphasizing sustainable energy solutions.
overview.description: Our curriculum combines fundamental electrical engineering principles with modern technologies in power electronics, renewable energy, and smart grid systems. Students gain practical experience through hands-on projects and industry collaborations.

programs.name: B.Tech in Electrical Engineering
programs.description: Comprehensive program covering power systems, control systems, electrical machines, and power electronics with focus on renewable energy integration.

labs.name: Power Systems Laboratory
labs.description: Advanced facility for studying power generation, transmission, and distribution systems.

labs.name: Control Systems Laboratory
labs.description: Modern laboratory for studying control systems and automation.

faculty.name: Dr. Rakesh Kumar
faculty.bio: Dr. Rakesh Kumar specializes in power systems with expertise in renewable energy integration and smart grid technologies.

faculty.name: Dr. Meera Sharma
faculty.bio: Dr. Meera Sharma focuses on control systems and power electronics with expertise in industrial automation.

achievements: Ranked among top 50 Electrical Engineering departments in India
Industry partnerships with power sector companies

contact.location: Block D, Second Floor, GEC Barmer Campus
